sections.paragraph: to grow weak, to grow dim, to grow faint, to falter, to be weak, to be dim, to be darkened, to be restrained, to be faint, to fail
a) (Qal) to grow dim, to grow faint
b) (Piel) to faint, to grow weak, to grow faint

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to be weak, that is, (figuratively) to despond (causatively rebuke), or (of light, the eye) to grow dull: - darken, be dim, fail, faint, restrain, X utterly.
Cognate: H3543, H3544, H3545
